column4: When trying to export an sql database using this command mysql -u username -p -h localhost database-name < database-backup.sql I am getting an error wrong password. The password is corect. Any ideas?
except the <  for export...   try without "-h localhost"
Gordonjcp: I am getting this error mysqldump: Got error: 1045: Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: YES) when trying to connect
I am getting this error : mysqldump: Got error: 1045: Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: NO) when trying to connect
